title: Restore backup from cloud only restored previously installed apps and contacts
content: I recently backed up and factory reset my phone to have it repaired. When I tried to restore the backup, only my contacts and apps were restored. The Backup page in Settings -> System -> Backup says App Data, Call History, Device Settings, and SMS Text Messages are all still "waiting to back up..." and have been for over an hour. Did I just lose all my messages and phone history?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
